EmailTemplate.name: Licensee decline - licensee - no employer
EmailTemplate.subject: You declined an invitation to join {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c}. Your license is inactive.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You declined an invitation to join {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
Your license is inactive.
You must accept an invitation to join a business to activate your license.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI011
